welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Goodlettsville! We are delighted to have you here in our charming city, known for its small-town charm and southern hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Goodlettsville has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nashville International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Nashville International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Nashville International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Nashville International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Smyrna Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
